nodes.name: Top 10 Items by Requests and YoY Change

datasourceFields.name: Overdue
Current Year Total Cases
Max Year?
Overdue
Total # Problems
Max Year?
Current Year Total Cases
Total Active Problems
% of Overdue
datasourceFields.formula:
// This is a calculated field
// It show the percentage incidents which are overdue

(IF ATTR([Overdue]="Overdue")
THEN COUNTD([Number])
END)
/
ATTR({ EXCLUDE [Overdue]:
COUNTD([Number])})

datasourceFields.name: Overdue
Max Year?
Max Year?
% of critical and high priority
datasourceFields.formula:
// This is a calculated field
// It shows the percentage of critical or high priority problems

COUNTD(IF [Priority]=1
OR  [Priority]=2
THEN [Number]
END)
/
COUNTD([Number])

nodes.name: AVG Time to Solve an Incident

datasourceFields.name: Time to Close an Incident (seconds)
Max Year?
Time to Close an Incident
datasourceFields.formula:
// This is a calculated field
// It transforms time in seconds into DD:HH:MM:SS format
STR(INT(AVG([Time to Close an Incident (seconds)])/86400)) 
 
+ " day(s) " + 
 
IF (INT(AVG([Time to Close an Incident (seconds)])%86400/3600)) 
< 10 THEN "0" ELSE "" END + STR(INT(AVG([Time to Close an Incident (seconds)])%86400/3600))
 
+ ":" + 
 
IF INT(AVG([Time to Close an Incident (seconds)])%3600/60) 
< 10 THEN "0" ELSE "" END + STR(INT(AVG([Time to Close an Incident (seconds)])%3600/60)) 
 
 
+ ":" + 
 
IF INT(AVG([Time to Close an Incident (seconds)]) %3600 %60) 
< 10 THEN "0" ELSE "" END + STR(INT(AVG([Time to Close an Incident (seconds)]) %3600 %60))

datasourceFields.name: % made SLA
datasourceFields.formula:
// This is a calculated field
// It shows the percentage of requests which made SLA

COUNTD(IF [Made SLA]= TRUE
THEN  [Number]
END)
/
COUNTD([Number])

datasourceFields.name: Max Year?
Overdue
% of Overdue
datasourceFields.formula:
// This is a calculated field
// It shows the percentage of incidents that are overdue

IFNULL((IF ATTR([Overdue]= "Overdue")
THEN COUNTD([Number])
END),0)
/
ATTR({ EXCLUDE [Overdue]:
COUNTD([Number])})

datasourceFields.name: Max Year?
Max Year?
Max Year?
Max Year?
Time Span Breakdown
datasourceFields.formula:
// This is a calculated field
// It groups problems accordingly with their ages

IF [Age of Problems]< 2592000
THEN "Under 30 d"
ELSEIF  [Age of Problems] > 7776000
THEN "+ than 90d"
ELSE " 30-90 d"
END

datasourceFields.name: Max Year?
Age of Problems
datasourceFields.formula:
//Calculates the age of active problems since opened until now

DATEDIFF('second', [Opened], NOW())

datasourceFields.name: Current Year Total Cases
Overdue
Total Active Incidents
Max Year?
Opened Month Tooltip
datasourceFields.formula:
// This is an IF statment using the opened field to allow for different formats
// original used on columns for line charts are formatted in starting letter of month i.e. J for January
// This version formats to full month name for the tooltip 


// The IF statement names the month based on the month number of the datefield
IF DATEPART('month', [Opened]) = 1 THEN 'January'
ELSEIF DATEPART('month', [Opened]) = 2 THEN 'February'
ELSEIF DATEPART('month', [Opened]) = 3 THEN 'March'
ELSEIF DATEPART('month', [Opened]) = 4 THEN 'April'
ELSEIF DATEPART('month', [Opened]) = 5 THEN 'May'
ELSEIF DATEPART('month', [Opened]) = 6 THEN 'June'
ELSEIF DATEPART('month', [Opened]) = 7 THEN 'July'
ELSEIF DATEPART('month', [Opened]) = 8 THEN 'August'
ELSEIF DATEPART('month', [Opened]) = 9 THEN 'September'
ELSEIF DATEPART('month', [Opened]) = 10 THEN 'October'
ELSEIF DATEPART('month', [Opened]) = 11 THEN 'Novemeber'
ELSEIF DATEPART('month', [Opened]) = 12 THEN 'December'
ELSE NULL
END
